__e: Had the stranger unleashed in her what was already there, or only helped her discover a landscape she'd by necessity blinded herself to?
I'd never taken the time to look around, except on that day.
I just got tired of that same old country scenery.
You think that homeland is just a landscape?
God, I thought coming out here would take me mind off it, but the countryside's really boring, innit?
The hopis see time as a landscape,
One piece of land to call your own one landscape to look at one way to die?
If I see some landscape I like, and I wish there wasn't a factory in the background, I leave the factory out.
